pageProduct.name: Schwarzkopf Nordic L1+ Extreme Lightener New
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Nordic Blonde offers oil-enriched lightening wih OMEGAPLEX Anti-Breakage Technology for up to 80% less hair breakage* and a natural-looking blonde with great anti-yellow effect.
* vs untreated hair

The oil-enriched formula combined with OMEGAPLEX Anti-Breakage Technology delivers up to 80 % less hair breakage* and up to 8 levels of lift. The conditioning after treatment with anti-yellow effect will leave you with soft, sensational looking blonde hair.
* vs untreated hair

Suitable For: Suitable for Light Blonde to Medium Brown hair. Not suitable for more than slightly grey hair.

Product Claims: Up to 80% less hair breakage (vs. untreated hair).

Boxed Contents: 1 Tube Lightening Cream 50 ml
1 Applicator Bottle with
Developer 50 ml
1 Sachet Blonde Booster Ultra Plus 20 g
1 Sachet After Treatment 22.5 ml
1 Pair of Gloves
1 Instruction Leaflet
1 Applicator Tip

Size: 1 pack

KEY FEATURES

• With OMEGAPLEX Anti-Breakage Technology for up to 80% less hair breakage*
*vs untreated hair
• Natural-looking blonde
• Anti-yellow effect
• Up to 8 levels of lift (lightening)

Warnings

WARNING - This product contains ingredients
which may cause skin irritation to certain individuals. This product must not be
used for dyeing eyelashes or eyebrows; to do so may be injurious to the eye.
Do not use on broken skin. Wash hands thoroughly after use.

FIRST AID INFORMATION

FIRST AID: For advice, contact a Poisons Information Centre (Phone eg
Australia 13 1126; New Zealand 0800 764 766) or a doctor (at once). If swallowed,
do NOT induce vomiting. If in eyes, hold eyelids apart and flush the eye
continuously with running water. Continue flushing until advised to stop by the
Poisons Information Centre or a doctor, or for at least 15 minutes. If skin contact
occurs, remove contaminated clothing and flush skin with running water.

Ingredients

Lightening Cream: Aqua (Water, Eau) · Octyldodecanol · Ammonium Hydroxide · Xanthan
Gum · Sodium Gluceptate · Bis-Cetearyl Amodimethicone · Cellulose Gum · Sodium
Laureth Sulfate · Ammonium Sulfate · Parfum (Fragrance) · Etidronic Acid · Linalool ·
Citronellol · Benzyl Alcohol · CI 77007 (Ultramarines)
Developer: Aqua (Water, Eau) · Hydrogen Peroxide · Isopropyl Myristate · Cetearyl
Alcohol · PEG-40 Castor Oil · Ceteareth-20 · Sodium Cetearyl Sulfate · Etidronic Acid ·
Potassium Hydroxide · 2,6-Dicarboxypyridine · Disodium Pyrophosphate · Sodium Sulfate
Blonde Booster Ultra Plus: Potassium Persulfate · Sodium Silicate · Sodium Persulfate ·
Ammonium Persulfate · Aqua (Water, Eau) · Disodium EDTA · Paraffinum Liquidum (Mineral
Oil, Huile Minérale) · Silica · Potassium Sulfate · Ammonium Sulfate · Sodium Sulfate
Sachet After Treatment: Aqua (Water, Eau) · Cetearyl Alcohol · Behentrimonium
Chloride · Paraffinum Liquidum (Mineral Oil, Huile Minérale) · Dimethicone · Guar
Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride · Ceteareth-20 · Cetrimonium Chloride · Isopropyl
Alcohol · Phenoxyethanol · Parfum (Fragrance) · Potassium Phosphate · Prunus Armeniaca
(Apricot) Kernel Oil · Niacinamide · Panthenol · Methylparaben ·
Benzophenone-4 · Carbomer · Linalool · Potassium Hydroxide · Laureth-23 ·
Laureth-4 · Benzyl Salicylate · Sodium Chloride · Limonene · Benzyl Alcohol ·
Hexyl Cinnamal · Hydrolyzed Keratin · Sodium Salicylate · Acid Violet 43 · HC
Blue No. 12 · Potassium Sorbate · Sodium Benzoate

Contains: CONTAINS NOT MORE THAN 40 G/L AMMONIUM HYDROXIDE, 421 G/L POTASSIUM PERSULFATE, 128 G/L
AMMONIUM PERSULFATE, 154 G/L SODIUM PERSULFATE, 239 G/L ALKALINE SALTS AND 115 G/L HYDROGEN PEROXIDE

Directions

A perfect blonde in 3 steps:
1. MIX
2. SHAKE
3. APPLY
FULL HEAD: 30/45 min
ROOT REGROWTH: 30/40 min + 2/5 min full head
For detailed information please read the instruction leaflet carefully.

USAGE ADVICE

For hair longer than chin length or thick hair, we recommend using two packs.

SAFETY DIRECTIONS

Irritant. Attacks eyes - protect eyes when using.
Hair lighteners/colourants can cause severe allergic reactions. Read and follow
instructions. This product is not intended for use on persons under the age
of 16. Temporary "black henna" tattoos may increase your risk of allergy.
Do not lighten/colour your hair if:
- you have a rash on your face or sensitive, irritated and damaged scalp,
- you have ever experienced any reaction after lightening/colouring your hair,
- you have experienced a reaction to a temporary "black henna" tattoo in the
past.
Contains hydrogen peroxide, ammonia and persulfates. See bottom of pack
for full list of ingredients. Avoid contact with eyes. Rinse eyes immediately if
product comes into contact with them. Rinse hair well after application. Conduct
an allergy alert test 48 hours before each time you lighten/colour (see enclosed
leaflet), even if you have already used lightening/colouring products before.
Avoid contact with skin. Wear protective gloves when mixing or using. Keep
away from heat, sparks and naked flames. Mix strictly according to instructions.
May cause fire if it comes in contact with other chemicals, paper or other
flammable materials.
So remember to buy the product 48 hours in advance. In case of any reaction
or when in doubt consult a doctor before using any hair lightening/colouring
product.
Keep out of reach of children.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Box, leaflet, paperboard sleeve and bottle (after cleaning) can be placed in kerbside recycling bins.
Sachets, Bottle lid, applicator tip, gloves, glove packet, tube & tube cap
cannot be placed in kerbside recycling bins, but can be recycled via TerraCycle.
Visit TerraCycle.com for details.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
